definition: to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Place the chicken breast on cutting board, with one sheet of plastic film under it, and cover it with another sheet.
sentences.chinese: 将鸡胸肉放置在砧板上，上下各铺一张保鲜膜。

sentences.english: Remove from the pan to copping board until completely soft.
sentences.chinese: 等红椒完全变软了，取出放到干净的砧板上。

sentences.english: Separate cutting boards must be used for raw and ready-to-eat foods.
sentences.chinese: 未经烹煮的食品和现成食品应该各有不同的砧板。

sentences.english: Place dough on the floured board, and knead for approximately ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把面团放在撒满面粉的砧板上，然后揉大约十分钟。

sentences.english: As a result, education is on the chopping block.
sentences.chinese: 因此教育成了砧板上的鱼肉任人宰割。

sentences.english: Use clean cutting boards and utensils when handling fresh produce.
sentences.chinese: 使用清洁砧板及器皿处理新鲜农产品。

sentences.english: Knead the mixture on a lightly floured board until smooth and elastic.
sentences.chinese: 在砧板上搓揉搅匀的面粉，直到变得软且有弹性。

sentences.english: Soon the royal cook came to kill the willing victim on the block.
sentences.chinese: 很快，御厨来宰杀砧板上心甘情愿的牺牲者了。

sentences.english: My preferred option is a bamboo chopping board.
sentences.chinese: 我比较喜欢的是竹制的砧板。

sentences.english: Collection of modern cutting boards designed to make food preparation more efficient and enjoyable.
sentences.chinese: 收集现代砧板设计，享受备料的乐趣。

sentences.english: Lay out 1 phyllo sheet on a large cutting board;
sentences.chinese: 把1张面片摊在大砧板上，薄薄喷上一层植物油。

sentences.english: They kept a big stump in the house as a chopping block to kill cows on.
sentences.chinese: 他们在房子里放了一个树桩，当成杀牛的砧板。

sentences.english: The construction worker’s daughter had managed to purchase a small cutting board and a used pair of khaki pants.
sentences.chinese: 女儿买回来一块小砧板，一条二手卡其裤。

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
